Save Pinpoints to use in future activities
What can I do with Pinpoints?
Pinpoints are points given to you, Pinspire\'s members, for interacting with Pinspire\'s pins and other members.
When you get a Pinpoint, you will see a notification at the bottom of your screen. You can find your total number of points in your profile page.
How do I know when I get Pinpoints?
You can add a follow me on Pinspire button to your site to increase your followers and exposure. Simply log in and paste the following code snippet where you want the button to appear.
You can add a follow me on Pinspire button to your site to increase your followers and exposure. Simply paste the following code snippet where you want the button to appear.
Don\'t have a Pinspire account yet? Signup is free and only takes a few seconds.
Paste this code where you want the button to appear.

1. Make sure your favorites bar is visible

2. Drag the button to your bar (or right click and select)

1. While surfing the web, if you come across an image you want to pin, simply click the “Pin It” link in your bookmarks bar.

2. Select the image from the page you want to pin and add it to one of your collections

1.Select your button style
2.Fill out the page URL, img URL, and description
3.Copy and paste the code below onto your site
In the meantime, you can {0} if you have any questions.

Pinspire is a Virtual Pinboard where you can organise and share all the things that matter to you. Use your own pictures or those you find while browsing the web.

People use Pinspire to plan their weddings, redecorate their homes or organise their favorite recipes, but there are many more ways. Discover it for yourself!

You can also browse pinboards created by other users for inspiration.

Pinspire is built by a young team of people from all over the world.

We do our best every day to make Pinspire a website that people love to use.
Right now Pinpoints offer no rewards. In the future, Pinspire may run competitions and partnerships with brands to allow you to spend your points.
What rewards can I get with Pinpoints?
We haven\'t announced a start date yet but expect to launch within the next few months. Please, stay tuned and start pinning.
No, at this time they have no value. They are just a way to keep track of what you\'ve done and find other active Pinspire users.

• 1. The maximum amount of points that can be earned per day is 100 per action and 500 in total
  • 2. Followers gained through the signup process are not included
  • 3. Pinpoints are not a real currency and have no inherent value

Add to your Pinspire photo album on Facebook and tag your friends.
Connect to Facebook Timeline to upload this pin to Facebook and tag your friends.

About Pinspire

What is Pinspire?

Pinspire is a virtual pinboard - a place to save the pictures, messages, and things that inspire you. You can save images of your favorite fashion and hair styles, recipes and food, or places and people into organized collections. Pinspire's goal is to serve as a place for people to find inspiration for all aspects of their lives.

Who can use Pinspire and what does it cost?

Pinspire is free and open to anyone. You can use your Facebook account, Twitter account, or email to {0}.

What can I do with Pinspire?

Pinspire is a great place to save things that inspire you and share your style and stories with others in the Pinspire community. You can save a gift list, plan a home redecoration, or share pictures from your own life. We hope you will inspire and be inspired by Pinspire's passionate community.

What countries does pinspire operate in and in what languages?

Pinspire has pins from hundreds of thousands of people from all over the world. You can see a list of our countries by navigating to the flag icon in the top right corner. All of these countries offer the site controls, pins and other content in local languages. We want everyone in the world to have a great experience on Pinspire. And we know our users also enjoy seeing what people in other countries are pinning and saying - go ahead and explore!

How do I get started?

After signing up, you can browse pins using our Whats Hot page, category menu, or search box. When you find something you want to keep, click the repin icon. After clicking repin, you can create a collection for this pin, enter a description and save it. Repeat this and you're on your way!

Pinning Basics

What is a pin?

A pin is an image added to Pinspire along with the description and comments people have left about it. Pins can come from other websites or from users uploading them. They are free to add and you can add as many as you like. We keep the image of the pin so it will never go away, even if the site it was pinned from does.

What is a repin?

A repin is a pin copied from an existing pin. When users find pins they like, they click repin to save it onto their own collection. This creates a new pin with the same image and URL as the original.

What is a collection?

A collection is an organized group of pictures. Collections have a name and can have as many pins saved to them as you want.

What is following?

Following a user's board means that pins from this board will appear in the "People you follow" page. Following a user means that all of this user's boards, including new pins, will appear. You can follow a user by clicking on their profile thumbnail and clicking "Follow" beneath their profile picture. You can follow a board by viewing that board and clicking the "follow" button at the top.

Account Management

How do I sign up?

You can {1} with Facebook, Twitter, or email for free here. For email signup, all that is required is your name and password. For Facebook and Twitter signup, all that is required is an existing account with those sites.

How do I edit my account information including name, email settings and picture?

You can edit all of your account settings in the "Settings" page. To navigate to Settings, mouseover your profile pic in the top right banner and select "Settings" under the "My Account" section.

How do I connect my account to Facebook, Facebook Timeline, or Twitter?

If you have not signed up, you can connect to Facebook and Twitter on signup. If you are signed up, you can connect or disconnect to Facebook in the account Settings page by simply clicking a checkbox and clicking "allow". To connect to Timeline, connect your account to Facebook and then click "Connect" in the timeline header on the top of the Pinspire homepage.

Getting the most from Pinspire

What does the Pin It bookmark do?

By dragging or adding the {2} to your browser's bookmark bar, you can add pictures from other websites back to your Pinspire profile. You don't need to have Pinspire open for this to work. Simply visit a site you like, click the bookmark link, and then select your image. The following popup will allow you to login, select and board and pin the image back to your account.

How do I add a Pin It button to my website?

You need to fill out the image URL, site URL, and pin description in {3}. Then copy the resulting code and add it next to the image you want your users to pin. Adding this button increases the chances people will pin your pin, which will drive traffic back to your site as each link pin links directly to you.

How do I put a follow me on Pinspire button on my site?

Create a Pinspire account and then copy the code snippet {4} and place it on your website where you want the button to appear.

How can I improve my profile, number of views, and followers?

Pinning new images onto good collections is the only way to get your pins into our Whats Hot and category pages. So once you have created great collections of new and repined content, you should start seeing increased number of repins, likes, and comments. This will drive more people to view your profile and follow your pins. Once you have followers, it is even easier to get your pins seen!

How do I contact Pinspire?

You can contact us {5}. We read every email we get.

Facebook Timeline is here.

Connecting to Timeline is one of Facebook\'s newest features.

When your account is connected, your Pinspire activity will be neatly consolidated onto your Facebook Timeline. Connecting only takes 2 seconds and will start working automatically.

You can disconnect at any time.
New! Connect your account to Facebook Timeline.

Pinspire is an online pinboard. Collect and share what inspires you.
Please select the name of collection
Add this code to your site.
Adding a "Pin It" button to your site allows users to pin your products onto Pinspire. It functions like Facebook’s like button and can increase traffic and sharing of your content.

Pinspire\'s Pin It button functions like Facebook\'s share and Twitter\'s tweet button. Pin It is a great way to spread your site\'s content to thousands of new people. A description of the image is optional, but it is recommended and will increase the number of views and clicks for that image.


Please note: you can have multiple Pin It buttons on each page by using the Advanced code. For example, a catalog may wish to use multiple Pin It buttons to index all the products listed on one page. Please make sure that each button\'s code is next to the correct product!
Pin It Button for websites and companies

You\'ve been invited to join Pinspire.
Welcome to Pinspire - collect and share your inspirations. At Pinspire you can browse thousands of pins to find the perfect style, product, recipe and more.
Browse and share your pins, repin and create boards, and upload photos directly. All for free.

Discover, collect, and share images you love on Pinspire. Use Pinspire to decorate your space, discover your next vacation spot, or find a perfect gift.

Create your own collections of pins in just minutes with the Pinspire app. Find a cool hairstyle or a beautiful saying? Maybe a hot outfit or silly cartoon? Pin them from any website, or use your camera to create a pin on the spot. You can find inspiration from other people’s collections, and share your own with friends.

App Features:
- Create a new Pinspire account
- Login with Facebook
- Browse pins by category, country, and person
- Create collections and follow new people
- Add new pins directly from your device
- Repin, comment and like pins

Pinspire is an international community of real people with unique tastes, real stories, and lots to share.
